accueil.title: Agile Grenoble

description.paragraphe1: Do you like stories ? So if we were telling the origin of agility, would you be interested ?
description.paragraphe2: This year we will make you discover or rediscover that agility is primarily technical and that it’s not so easy to frequently deliver a good quality product without having good practices. We’ll also talk about people, and the difficulty of making them work together and techniques that facilitate the build of a successful team. We will remind you that it’s for bringing value to users that we do all this. And finally, we will not forget to tell you that this requires a change of mindset, some letting go and benevolence.

accueil.date: Come to Agile Grenoble to hear the stories of those who live or attempt Agility, during one or more days, november 16-19th 2016.

agilegreconf.title: Agile Grenoble Conf
agilegreconf.description: The great typical day Thursday with a rich program consisting of many tracks, high quality keynotes, surprises, coffee all day and a drink in the late afternoon. Not to mention the now famous 'Before' and 'After', now part of the reasons for coming to Grenoble for that day.
agilegreconf.callforpapers1:
The call for papers for Agile Grenoble Conf will open mid-june.
An early-selection will occur on beginning of july.
The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.callforpapers2:
The call for papers is opened until 3rd September.
An early-selection will occur on sessions registered before July 8, 2016. The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.callforpapers3:
The call for papers is opened until 3rd September.
The final program will be defined in september.
agilegreconf.selection: An early-selection have been done on sessions registered before July 8, 2016

agilegrelab.title: Agile Grenoble Lab
agilegrelab.description: New in 2016, Wednesday will be dedicated to a day of practice-oriented workshop training. Several experts, selected by the organizing team, will make you experience different practical workshops in technical fields related to the role of the Product Owner, Scrum Master, or Manager.

agilegreforum.title: Agile Grenoble Forum
agilegreforum.description: On Friday, which was established in 2011 to enable Agile experienced, or less experienced, to discuss topics that interest them in a free environment and uninhibited, without program, without sponsors and without obligation.

agilegre4kids.title: Agile Grenoble 4Kids
agilegre4kids.description: On Saturday, new edition of the Agile conference that helps Kids 6 to 11 years to develop creativity, confidence and collective intelligence through fun workshops specially designed for the occasion.

apropos.title: About
apropos.description: The conference Agile Grenoble exists since 2008 and the 2016 edition will be the 9th conference in a row. The event is wholly organized by the volunteers of the Club Agile Rhône-Alpes Grenoble, with of course the support of our sponsors and partners.

cara.title: Club Agile Rhône Alpes (CARA)
cara.description: The CARA is a non-profit association, striving to promote and disseminate agile methods in the Rhône-Alpes area to a large public, with various means: conference, seminars, meetings and partnerships.
